name: GAFM Global Academy of Finance and Management Standards Council
legal: Chartered Limited Liability Company - International Board of Standards
goal:
The GAFM ® International Board of Standards of the Global Academy of Finance and Management ® provides several different graduate standards programs, exams, board certifications, credentials, and professional designations in General and International Finance, Risk Management, Wealth Management, Management Consulting, Certified Project Management, IT-Project Management, Project Risk, Program Mgt., Strategic Project Management and Planning, and Tactical Project Management or Quality Control, Management Consulting, Financial Anaysis, Engineering, Human Resources, Sustainability and Human Resources etc. Dedicated to the establishment of high professional standards for the Project Management industry, using a set of certification programs in conjunction with the Global Academy of Finance and Management and AAPM AAFM
